price: 65. donde permanecerán para siempre, y no encontrarán quién los proteja o auxilie.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ لَّا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā abadan lā yajidūna waliyyan walā naṣīran
